sqlMap.select: SELECT a.name as name, substr(a.jumin_no,0,6) as juminNo1, substr(a.jumin_no,7,13) as juminNo2, substr(a.code,0,4) as code1, substr(a.code,5,8) as code2, Max(case when #bunChk# = 'N' then f.addr||' '||a.h_addr else e.addr||' '||a.f_addr end) as addr, c.p_mok_name as pMokName, substr(b.pum_code, 1, 4) as pumCode, sum(b.p_sok_cnt) as sokCnt, sum(b.pan_price) as panPrice, sum(b.p_box_cnt) as boxCnt ,decode(b.p_bun_chk,'N','절화','Y','난','C','관엽') as bunChkNm ,to_char(to_date(#startDate#),'yyyy-mm-dd') as startDate ,to_char(to_date(#endDate#),'yyyy-mm-dd') as endDate ,to_char(sysdate,'yyyy') as sYear ,to_char(sysdate,'mm') as sMonth ,to_char(sysdate,'dd') as sDay FROM view_e_zip_no@flower f, view_e_zip_no@flower e, a_chul_info@flower a, v_sang_pan_list@flower b, v_mok_jong_list@flower c, a_day_magam@flower g WHERE b.chul_code = a.code AND b.pum_code = c.pum_code AND a.h_zip_pk = f.zip_pk AND a.f_zip_pk = e.zip_pk AND b.p_bun_chk = g.bun_chk AND b.pan_day = g.magam_ilja AND b.p_bun_chk = #bunChk# AND b.pan_day between #startDate# and #endDate# AND b.km_list in ('1', '3', '4') AND b.chul_code = #chulCode# GROUP BY a.name, a.jumin_no, a.code, b.p_bun_chk, c.p_mok_name, substr(b.pum_code, 1, 4) ORDER BY 4 ASC

select sum(boxCnt) as sumBoxCnt, sum(sokCnt) as sumSokCnt, sum(panPrice) as sumPanPrice from ( SELECT a.name as name, substr(a.jumin_no,0,6) as juminNo1, substr(a.jumin_no,7,13) as juminNo2, Max(case when #bunChk# = 'N' then f.addr||' '||a.h_addr else e.addr||' '||a.f_addr end) as addr, c.p_mok_name as pMokName, substr(b.pum_code, 1, 4) as pumCode, sum(b.p_sok_cnt) as sokCnt, sum(b.pan_price) as panPrice, sum(b.p_box_cnt) as boxCnt ,to_char(to_date(#startDate#),'yyyy-mm-dd') as startDate ,to_char(to_date(#endDate#),'yyyy-mm-dd') as endDate FROM view_e_zip_no@flower f, view_e_zip_no@flower e, a_chul_info@flower a, v_sang_pan_list@flower b, v_mok_jong_list@flower c, a_day_magam@flower g WHERE b.chul_code = a.code AND b.pum_code = c.pum_code AND a.h_zip_pk = f.zip_pk AND a.f_zip_pk = e.zip_pk AND b.p_bun_chk = g.bun_chk AND b.pan_day = g.magam_ilja AND b.p_bun_chk = #bunChk# AND b.pan_day between #startDate# and #endDate# AND b.km_list in ('1', '3', '4') AND b.chul_code = #chulCode# GROUP BY a.name, a.jumin_no, c.p_mok_name, substr(b.pum_code, 1, 4) )

SELECT U.CODE as code, U.NAME as name, U.BUN_CHK as bunChk FROM A_CHUL_INFO@flower U, A_C_GROUP@flower G WHERE U.G_CODE = G.G_CODE AND U.G_CODE = #domeCode# AND U.BUN_CHK = #bunChk# ORDER BY U.G_CODE ASC, U.NAME ASC
